segments.text: It is enough for today . Do you have any last question ? If not , thank you for taking your time to come to our interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You â€™ re welcome . For the moment , I have no further questions . I got a good picture of the job and the company . All my questions have been answered . Thank you for your time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will have an internal discussion and then we will contact to inform you of our decision on whether we continue with you or not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , it was very nice to talk with you and I look forward to your decision at your earliest convenience . Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
